extendedInfo.description: Welcome to the Official Android app for the Masters Tournament. Bringing you closer than ever to the beauty and excitement of the Masters Tournament, the official Android app for the Masters in Augusta, Georgia, April 8-14, 2013 provides the most comprehensive digital coverage available.The Official Masters Tournament Android app includes: - EIGHT LIVE STREAMS OF VIDEO CONTENT - Wednesdayâs Par 3 Contest - Tournament play at Amen Corner (Hole Nos. 11, 12, and 13) - Tournament play at Hole Nos. 15 and 16 - Two channels of Featured Groups on their play of the second nine- Masters In-Depth â A live highlights channel during ESPN and CBS broadcast- Masters On the Range â Special analysis from a live-streamed Practice Range show starting Monday, April 8th through Sunday, April 14th.- Masters Green Jacket Ceremony at the conclusion of Tournament play- All video will be viewable with 3G or better mobile services and Wi-Fi connectionsÂ (Live video is available to view in the United States only.) ON-DEMAND VIDEO HIGHLIGHTS, FEATURESÂ AND PLAYER INTERVIEWSEXCLUSIVE LIVE SCORING - Interact with the live Leader Board, which features up-to-the-minute scoring and video highlights of the greatest moments on the courseÂ COURSE OVERVIEWÂ - Detailed course information with imagery, flyover videos, and par and yardage for each of the Masters Tournamentâs prestigious 18 holesÂ COMPREHENSIVE NEWS COVERAGEÂ - Pairings, tee times, player information, alerts, and all of the latest news and updates from the Masters Tournament.GETTING THERE- Detailed driving directions and an interactive map for patrons traveling to Augusta National Golf Club.

reviews.title: Favorite major but app...
reviews.comment: Though better than last year is still not up to Masters standard.  Disappointing but suppose they\'ll get it at some point.
reviews.author: Brian Chmura

reviews.title: Awesome App
reviews.comment: Hands down this is the best live sports app I\'ve ever used! The player videos are excellent and stream without issue.  Also lots of extra features not offered online.
reviews.author: J Andrew Murray

reviews.title: Live stream broken
reviews.comment: Application looks nice, but when i try to run the live stream on a galaxy tab 10.1 running jellybean, it looks like its getting ready to load and back to the video screen. Updated the app hoping I can enjoy the masters on the train and still nothing. I can run it on my phone though
reviews.author: Michael Scott

reviews.title: Flawless!
reviews.comment: This app is awesome if you have a great wifi connection. I didn\'t miss a minute of the tournament!
reviews.author: Jennifer Evans

reviews.title: We have a winner...
reviews.comment: Runs flawlessly. Live video is fluid. Stats update quickly. And it\'s truly no charge, though I\'d pay a one time install fee to lose the ads on this. Got golf? Get this!
reviews.author: Matthew Peidl

reviews.title: Runs great.
reviews.comment: No complaints. Was able to hook it up to the TV, too. Nice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Superb!
reviews.comment: Great live coverage. Wonderful pictures and up to date news. Excellent!!!
reviews.author: Jar Nuckd

reviews.title: Can\'t get any better!
reviews.comment: Great app, no complaints whatsoever.
reviews.author: Ken Gaskill

reviews.title: Well designed
reviews.comment: One of the best apps I\'ve used. Quick, well laid out and the videos stream very quickly.
reviews.author: Jacob Ryker

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Fantastic app. All the info you need if your not able to get to your TV.
reviews.author: Paul Williams

reviews.title: WTF
reviews.comment: Can\'t watch par 3 contest. I hope the live feed for the turney will work, that\'s why I got this app. Will give it 5 stars if works during turney.  Edit: 4/12/13.....Still no live stream!!!  And the radio, you can barely hear it....Warp, rooted, stacked, jacked, and over clocked.  Edit: After update now have live stream. As promised now 5 stars. Every thing now working perfectly.Edit: Was working now constant buffering and having to restart video. I am home now on wifi, VIOS, will hate to see it on 3g if it buffers like this on wifi. Back to 1 star. Working much better now after running it for awhile. 4 stars. Worst piece of crap. On start up video buffers, have to restart, Trying to watch now for 20 min it sucks. Worked yesterday not today.Back to 1 star.
reviews.author: michael sylvester

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: Really great tournament app - best I\'ve seen. The videos are fantastic quality. A really well thought out and extremely well presented app. Thanks!
reviews.author: mo mo

reviews.title: Work(ed) well
reviews.comment: Worked great first two rounds. Now my video player only shows 10 sec of  live video and then stops or goes black. Please fix by Sunday. Motorola RAZR M on WiFi
reviews.author: Nathan Brown

reviews.title: Working good now
reviews.comment: Was having issues but 45 mins after installation its now working great.
reviews.author: Jeff Haverfield

reviews.title: Wonderful companion to tournament!
reviews.comment: The hole flyovers are so beautiful it\'s like being there. Thanks for the fun app.
reviews.author: Scott Carey

reviews.title: Worked great yesterday
reviews.comment: Not working on Saturday.....live video will only play for a few seconds and then shuts off. Tried everything....restart phone and reinstalled app to no avail
reviews.author: Thomas Probst

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: It works  as beautifully as it looks The app loads fast. Looks spectacular, and works great. Has all the info I need to keep up with the tournament, while I\'m not able to watch it.  Great job. Other app makers should study this one and take note of how to do it right!!!!
reviews.author: Frank Saenz

reviews.title: Perfect for on the go.
reviews.comment: This app is great when you can\'t watch it on TV. I can\'t wait for next year.
reviews.author: Jeff Edmondson

reviews.title: This app sounds as good as it looks!
reviews.comment: I\'m not a huge golf fan but this is wonderful.  The sound on this app is incredible.  To hear the birds chirping and I even heard a bubbling brook!  The video works very well also!
reviews.author: Gary Williams

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This is they way all apps should be like so nice and the streaming is flawless and I can watch anywhere and the best part is there  is no cost at all this is a brilliant application love it
reviews.author: Zach B
